exercises.name: Single Leg Stand
exercises.instructions: Stand on one leg near support. Keep posture tall and steady breathing.

exercises.name: Tandem Walk
exercises.instructions: Walk heel-to-toe in a straight line. Use light support if needed.

exercises.name: Weight Shifts
exercises.instructions: Shift weight side-to-side slowly while keeping feet planted.

exercises.name: Clock Reach
exercises.instructions: Stand on one leg and reach the other foot lightly to positions like a clock face.
